org.stormdev.authlib.json.response

Class LoginRequestResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stormdev.authlib.json.response.LoginRequestResponse

  • public class LoginRequestResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    The response from the server for trying to login a user

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getEmail()
      The email associated with this StormDev account.
      LoginRequestError getError()
      Get why the login was unsuccessful (Eg.
      java.lang.String getFullName()
      The user's full name as entered on StormDev.org.
      java.lang.String getNickName()
      The user's one word nickname as entered on StormDev.org.
      java.lang.String getProfilePicURL()
      A URL which points to the user's profile picture as shown on StormDev.org, this can be put into a HTML tag, etc...
      Rank getRank()
      Their rank on the StormDev website
      long getRemainingCooldownTimeUntilNextRequestMS()
      Returns how long the user has to wait before trying to login again, in milliseconds
      java.lang.String getSessionID()
      The sessionID associated with the StormDev account's login session.
      boolean isCooldownUntilNextRequest()
      If the user has had too many attempts in a short space of time and has to wait before trying to login again
      boolean isSentEmails()
      If the user wants to receive emails about promotions, news, etc...
      StormLogin toStormLogin()
      Generate a StormLogin object for this session, useful to use with StormAuthLib to easily logout the user later or check if they're still logged in
      boolean wasAnError()
      If something was wrong with the login (Eg.
      boolean wasSuccessful()
      If the request was successful, aka they logged in

    • Method Detail

      • wasSuccessful

        public boolean wasSuccessful()
        If the request was successful, aka they logged in
        Returns:
        If the login was successful

      • wasAnError

        public boolean wasAnError()
        If something was wrong with the login (Eg. the password was wrong, etc...)
        Returns:
        If the login was unsuccessful

      • getError

        public LoginRequestError getError()
        Get why the login was unsuccessful (Eg. the password was wrong, etc...)
        Returns:
        Why the login was unsuccessful

      • isCooldownUntilNextRequest

        public boolean isCooldownUntilNextRequest()
        If the user has had too many attempts in a short space of time and has to wait before trying to login again
        Returns:
        If the user has to wait before trying to login again

      • getRemainingCooldownTimeUntilNextRequestMS

        public long getRemainingCooldownTimeUntilNextRequestMS()
        Returns how long the user has to wait before trying to login again, in milliseconds
        Returns:
        In milliseconds, how long the user has to wait before trying to login again

      • getSessionID

        public java.lang.String getSessionID()
        The sessionID associated with the StormDev account's login session. This can be used to logout the user and make authenticated requests to StormDev.
        Returns:
        The SessionID for this login session

      • getEmail

        public java.lang.String getEmail()
        The email associated with this StormDev account.
        Returns:
        Their email

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        The user's full name as entered on StormDev.org.
        Returns:
        Their full name

      • getNickName

        public java.lang.String getNickName()
        The user's one word nickname as entered on StormDev.org.
        Returns:
        Their nick name

      • getProfilePicURL

        public java.lang.String getProfilePicURL()
        A URL which points to the user's profile picture as shown on StormDev.org, this can be put into a HTML tag, etc...
        Returns:
        The URL pointing to the user's profile picture

      • isSentEmails

        public boolean isSentEmails()
        If the user wants to receive emails about promotions, news, etc... from StormDev.
        Returns:
        True = They want to receive emails, False = They don't

      • getRank

        public Rank getRank()
        Their rank on the StormDev website
        Returns:
        The rank, Eg. DEFAULT, ADMIN, SUPER_ADMIN, OWNER

      • toStormLogin

        public StormLogin toStormLogin()
        Generate a StormLogin object for this session, useful to use with StormAuthLib to easily logout the user later or check if they're still logged in
        Returns:
        The StormDev login session as a StormLogin object
